CustomField.description: Being populated by a workflow because the formula to do it was too big to execute as a formula field. 1. If Safety Service Model Field = 1 the field is not populated (or required) 2. If Safety Service Model Field = 2 the date is 6 months - uses date_opened_plus_six_months__c 3. If Safety Service Model Field = 3, 4, or 5 the date is 90 days
CustomField.label: Follow Up Date
